title: Prohibits use of safety strobe light to change a traffic signal
summary: Prohibits use of safety strobe light to change a traffic signal by an unauthorized person.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2076

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 13, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. REILICH, FINCH, KOLB, McDONOUGH -- Multi-Spon-
         sored by -- M. of A.  CALHOUN, OAKS -- read once and referred  to  the
         Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to unlawful use
         of a safety strobe light

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The vehicle and traffic law is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 1115-a to read as follows:
    3    S 1115-A. UNLAWFUL USE OF A SAFETY STROBE LIGHT.  IT SHALL BE UNLAWFUL
    4  FOR ANY PERSON TO USE A SAFETY STROBE LIGHT FOR THE PURPOSE OF SWITCHING
    5  A   TRAFFIC   SIGNAL.  THIS  PROVISION  SHALL  NOT  APPLY  TO  EMERGENCY
    6  AGENCIES/PERSONNEL OR LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES AND PERSONS AUTHORIZED BY
    7  SAID AGENCIES TO USE SAID LIGHTS.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03830-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to unlawful use of a safety strobe light
